org.gsma.joyn.session

Class MultimediaSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gsma.joyn.session.MultimediaSession

  • public class MultimediaSession
extends java.lang.Object
    This class maintains the information related to a multimedia session and offers methods to manage it.
    Author:
    Jean-Marc AUFFRET
